abstracts.cdata!:
The outcome for the Bielsko-Biala Water
            and Wastewater Project for Poland was highly satisfactory,
            the sustainability was highly likely, the institutional
            development impact was high, and the Bank performance was
            satisfactory, and the borrower performance was highly
            satisfactory. Lessons learned from the project:
            BIELSKO-BIALA AQUA S.A./AQUA created a sound financial basis
            and took advantage of the knowledge and experience of
            international firms to strengthen the utility and prioritize
            and design its investment program. The past practice of
            using unprotected steel pipes (even small sizes were not
            galvanized) has resulted in badly corroded water
            distribution networks with high levels of physical water
            losses. Correcting this problem will be costly and require
            replacement of major portions of the water networks.
